content: There are smart-on-fhir/client-js and Vermonster/fhir-kit-client on github. If there any other client package provide similar functionalities? Which one do you use?

There are smart-on-fhir/client-js and Vermonster/fhir-kit-client on github. If there any other client package provide similar functionalities? Which one do you use?

There's also symptomatic/smart-on-fhir-client, but it's fairly dependent on the Meteor.js ecosystem and proprietary for the time being. Supports multi-token OAuth and all of the major EHRs though.
